pullrequest.title: Use direct API call to Scene::SetPoseMsg to update poses from physics for server-side rendering

content.raw: I originally just made the function pointer an optional argument, but I realized that the scene might never get updated poses if you pass a `nullptr` once we fully merge the changes that are currently commented out (Scene stops subscribing to `~/pose/local/info` if it's part of a server). Now that I think about it, I suppose there is probably a complicated way to workaround it, but it goes beyond what's currently in that PR
